alert.note: Alert for Polk; San Jacinto; Trinity (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 1:42PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Trinity, northwestern San Jacinto and southwestern Polk Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 141 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sebastopol, or 17 miles northwest of Livingston, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Onalaska, Point Blank, Goodrich, Lake Livingston State Park, West Livingston and Oakhurst. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
